title: Yukemuri Mermaid
original_name: 湯けむり人魚姫〈マーメイド〉
sinopse: Eikichi is 16-year-old boy, who works in a family thermal bath. One day he is saved from drowning in the sea by an unknown and pretty girl, who promises him to stay and teach him how to swim. But he doesn't seem to know that she's really a mermaid princes...?
